title: Portfolio
description: Portfolio website to showcase a selection of my most impactful projects and my capabilities.

title: DiscordCloud
description:
Cloud storage application that utilizes Discord's platform for file storage and retrieval. It provides a simple way to upload, download, and manage files through a web interface. All files are encrypted for a extra layer of security.
This was for educational purposes.

title: AI-Driven Editor
description: AID is a web component developed in Lit that helps make writing and editing easier using artificial intelligence. With AID, you can quickly generate new content and improve existing text.
